Morning.Body: I wake up after a long night. It's past morning now, but I still feel extremely tired. That can be dealt with later, because it's time to start the day!

In Bed - Stay.Body: I struggle to resist my body's urge to get up. I'm unsuccessful, wrapped in the comfortable and warm confines of my bed. I doze off again, not sure how much time passed. Now it's time to get up.

Bedroom.Body: There's barely any light passing through the windows on this cloudy day. It's hard to believe it's well past morning.

Bedroom - Turn On.Body: I turn the computer at my desk on. It's taking a little longer to turn on than usual, but it gets there regardless. It's reliable. I wish I could be a machine.

Bedroom - Turn Off.Body: I have some work to do soon, but I turn off my computer. I'll do work once I'm in a better mindset.

Desk - Off.Body: I sit down at my desk, zoning out my monitor's blank screen. my tired reflection stares back, filling me with shame. I want this to end... The computer is off.

Desk - On.Body:
I launch my work applications, but I don't know what I'm doing. I feel lost and unmotivated to do any work. I don't feel like playing anything either. The idea of starting up a game feels daunting.
All I did was open and close some windows, and sometimes dragging them around. This is not helping. I need to get off.

In Bed - Return.Body: I give up and return to comforts of my bed. I'm not sleepy enough to nap, so I lie browsing on my phone. Too much time passes and I don't feel any better. I should stop.

Bathroom.Body: With the taste of bad breath lingering in my mouth, I decide to brush my teeth. I think of showering, but the memory of getting in cold water deters me. I continue brushing far longer than necessary pondering this dilemma. I'll shower later.
Bathroom.Brush: I return to the bathroom staring at the shower. As much as it would help me, I got other things to do first. A shower can wait.

Kitchen.Body: Entering the kitchen, I start feeling hungry. I approach the fridge looking at what's there to eat. There's not much and I'll need to go grocery shopping soon. I can't wait another day.

Kitchen - Pasta.Body:
I got a new pasta shape I've been wanting to try out and a new sauce recipe that I've been craving. 
But, I'm missing one of the ingredients. Usually I would substitute, but I dread having to cook and then clean all those dishes... Guess I'm not craving it today. Time for something else.

Kitchen - Ramen.Brush:
I instead go to the closet and grab a pack of ramen. On a better day, I would add seared spam, seaweed, boiled vegetables, a soft-boiled egg, and a bunch of my own seasoning. 
Today is not that kind of day. Boiling the water already feels like too much work for me, but at least I did it. The food is not much and a little bland, but at least I didn't have to cook or clean.
Kitchen - Ramen.Body: That normally sounds appealing, but not right now. I realize how much my breath stinks and I don't want even think about food anymore.

Outside.Body: I need groceries really badly, but I'm too hungry to set out.
Outside.Food: As I push myself to go, I look out the window and notice the sidewalk getting painted in small dark circular patches. It's raining. I have enough food, groceries will have to wait another day.

Late.Body: The time completely shocks me. I can't believe how absurdly late it is already. I'm tired anyways. If I don't want to waste the next day too, I just have to go to bed now.

Good Night.Body: I get in bed, staring at the ceiling. I reflect back on this unincredibly unproductive day. I got nothing done, couldn't even take care of myself, and just spent the whole day feeling bad. I turn to my side and close my eyes, hoping for some comfort. None of that matters anymore. I just want this day to be over.
